ygData.subject: Re: Where is the Lesser Shielding spell?
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve searched through the whole mage/wiz guild to no avail.  Please tell me if anyone has been successful in locating lesser shielding there and from which
ygData.messageBody:
I've searched through the whole mage/wiz guild to no avail. Please tell me if anyone
has been successful in locating lesser shielding there and from which specific
merchant.

"Murphy, Kenneth E." wrote:

> From: "Murphy, Kenneth E." <MurphyK@...>
>
> > From: "Renaissance Man" <cossettb@...>
> >
> >
> > I'm a Dark Elf in Neriak, and I can't find the Lesser
> > Shielding spell for
> > the life of me. Does anyone know who sells it? This is frustrating.
> >
>
> Hello.
>
> As a general rule of thumb, most multi class spells are located on a COMMON
> vendor that is positioned between the other classes in a guild. This is
> usually stuff like gate and bind, and the shielding spells ect.
>
> The gate and lesser shielding spells are sold in Neriak in the Middle zone
> in the building that has the wizard/enchanter/magician vendors. When you go
> to the building I think it is the first vendor on the right.
>
> I know for sure its not in the necromancer's guild.
>
> Eloric
> Necromancer (Rank 2) Mythannial Marr
>
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> The possibilities are endless!
> http://www.onelist.com
> ONElist has something for everyone!
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> This list is basically unmoderated. However abusive language will not be tolerated
